shot.primary_lens: Zeiss Supreme Prime 35mm T1.5, wide open at T1.5 for shallow depth of field
shot.composition: Medium shot, agent walking towards the camera, rule of thirds applied to place the agent slightly off-center, leading lines from the architecture.
shot.camera_motion: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Smooth Steadicam tracking shot, slowly dollying in (push-in) to emphasize the agent's confidence and the space's grandeur.. Sequence 2 (8-12s): Smooth transition to wider establishing shot, then slow push-in to capture detail and emotion. Sequence 3 (12-20s): Final close-up with subtle dolly movement, ending on a confident, impactful frame.

wardrobe.suit: Tailored, light beige linen suit (modern cut)
wardrobe.accessories: Minimalist gold jewelry, high-end leather watch

sequences.primary_motion: The agent smoothly walks through the open-plan living area of the penthouse, gesturing subtly towards the panoramic view with her right hand.
Building on the initial action, the subject demonstrates additional aspects and benefits. The movement becomes more fluid and confident, showcasing expertise and comfort.
sequences.camera_follows: Wider shot revealing more context, then pushing in for detail

sequences.primary_motion: The subject concludes with a moment of satisfaction - a knowing smile, a final appreciative glance, or a confident gesture that conveys success and approval of the result.
sequences.camera_follows: Close-up on emotional response and final impactful moment

scene.location: Ultra-modern luxury penthouse living room, high floor, floor-to-ceiling windows.

layout.width: Spacious, open-plan area with minimalist, high-end Italian furniture (B&B Italia style)
layout.flooring: Large format polished concrete or light oak parquet
layout.walls: Textured white walls, one wall entirely glass with a breathtaking city skyline view
layout.decor: Large abstract sculpture, high-end coffee table books, subtle floral arrangement

scene.time_of_day: Golden hour (late afternoon), sun streaming in from the west.

environment.background: Vibrant, slightly blurred city skyline at sunset, visible through the large windows
environment.temporal_progression: Environment remains consistent throughout the 20-second narrative. Background elements may subtly shift focus as camera moves, but spatial continuity is maintained for coherent storytelling.

lighting.primary_source: Natural window light (backlight/rim light from the sunset)
lighting.quality: Soft diffused light, with sharp, long shadows from the low sun angle
lighting.color_temperature: Warm (3200K - 4000K) to enhance the golden hour effect and luxury feel
lighting.key_to_fill_ratio: 2:1 (slightly dramatic, high contrast to emphasize luxury)
lighting.evolution: Lighting remains consistent throughout the 20-second sequence, maintaining the established mood. Subtle adjustments in intensity during the final 6 seconds to emphasize the emotional climax and create visual impact.

color_grading.palette: Warm neutrals (beige, cream, gold) and deep blues from the twilight sky.
color_grading.tone: Aspirational, elegant, high-contrast cinematic look with slightly desaturated shadows and vibrant highlights.

audio.ambient: Very low-level, distant city sounds (traffic, muffled sirens), subtle air conditioning hum.
audio.foley: Sequence 1 (0-8s): Soft, controlled footsteps on the polished floor, subtle rustle of the linen suit.. Sequence 2: Additional environmental sounds, subtle interactions with objects, breathing, fabric movement. Sequence 3: Final satisfying sound (smile, exhale, object placement), ambient fade.
audio.music: Uplifting, sophisticated, minimalist orchestral track (e.g., piano and strings) with a slow build. The score builds progressively over 20 seconds, starting subtly and crescendoing toward the final moment. Emotional peak at 14-18s, then resolving with a confident, memorable final chord at 20s.

visual_rules.frame_purity: without text overlays, logos unless branded, no subtitles, no visible crew or equipment.

quality_requirements.hyperrealism: Photorealistic detail, perfect skin texture, natural light falloff

visual_rules.realism: Fluid athletic movements and biomechanically correct. Defined muscular anatomy with credible sweating. Dynamic lighting accentuating physical form. Effort and intensity visible in expressions.
visual_rules.continuity: Logical progression of physical effort intensity. Consistency of sweating and signs of fatigue. Maintenance of posture and technical form. Continuity of lighting and visible motivation.

technical_specifications.output_quality: ProRes 422 HQ equivalent, maximum detail retention
